original: intros. intros Hf Hx. pose proof (filterlim_switch_1 F1 FF1 F2 FF2 f g h (h x)) as H. assert (filterlim g F2 (locally (h x))) as H1. { apply filterlim_locally_close with (f0:=f) (l:=g (h x)); auto. } assert (filterlim h F1 (locally (h x))) as H2. { apply H with (l:=h x); auto. } pose proof (H _ H1 _ H2 _ Hf _ Hx) as H3. exists (lim g). apply H3.
